is_available.description: Is lesson is available based on drip settings, "true"/"false"

is_complete.description: If the lesson has been completed by a specific user, "true"/"false"

is_free.description: If the lesson is marked as "free", "true"/"false"

course.description: Course ID or "current" for current course where the lesson is assigned.

section.description: Section ID or "current" for current section where the lesson is assigned.

quiz.description: Quiz ID or "current" for current quiz of the lesson it is assigned.

available_date.description: Get the date a course became or will become available according to element drip settings - if no drip, published date used

points.description: Number of points assigned to the lesson, used to calculate the weight of the lesson when grading courses

is_complete.description: If Lesson is completed by specific user, "true"/"false"

require_assignment_passing_grade.description: If Lesson require assignment passing grade, "true"/"false"

is_drip_past.description: If Lesson has drip is past, "true"/"false"

user_has_access.description: If User has access to the lesson, string "true"/"false"

drip_method.description: What sort of drip method to utilize [''(none)|date|enrollment|start|prerequisite]

date_available.description: Date when lesson becomes available, applies when drip_method is "date"

time_available.description: Optional time to make lesson available on date_available when drip_method is "date"

days_before_available.description: The number of days before the lesson is available, applies when drip_method is "enrollment" or "start"
